title: Ep220 Superstition Crimes
description:
This week, the gals explore the darker side of luck in a spiteful universe. Topics include an exceptionally vicious soap maker, a fatal fairy fluke, and the backstories behind our cultural habits. Open up a bottle of Winc's Invoke Cabernet Franc, knock on wood, and tune in for Superstition Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
